document.full_text: an orthodox jewish prayer observance by three passengers aboard an alaska airlines flight on sunday alarmed flight attendants unfamiliar with the ritual, prompting them to lock down the cockpit and issue a security alert, officials said.
document.title: jewish prayer ritual alarms alaska airlines crew
lines_and_colors: an orthodox jewish prayer observance by three passengers aboard an alaska airlines flight on sunday alarmed flight attendants unfamiliar with the ritual, prompting them to lock down the cockpit and issue a security alert, officials said.
